overview:
As VP of Marketing, Nadim leads all of PowerReviews’ marketing efforts.

Nadim joins PowerReviews with over a decade of experience in software-as-a-service. Most recently, Nadim was Director of Product Marketing and Management at Salesforce.com, where he led key launches during a period of hyper-growth. Prior to that, Nadim was product line manager for McAfee’s SaaS business, which he grew from startup to 3 million subscribers. Nadim was formerly with Amazon.com and has held sales and business development roles at early-stage startups. He began his career as a strategy consultant at Bain & Company.

Nadim holds an AB from Cornell University and an MBA from the Stanford Graduate School of Business. He is an avid traveler, and speaks French, Japanese and Bengali.
